Three situations in which mendicants sho: To prevent bad, unskillful qualities from arising
To give rise to skillful qualities
To endure physical pain—sharp, severe, acute, unpleasant, disagreeable, life-threatening
Qualities of a mendicant who is keen, al: Keen to prevent bad, unskillful qualities from arising
Keen to give rise to skillful qualities
Keen to endure physical pain—sharp, severe, acute, unpleasant, disagreeable, life-threatening
